main.description: Get comments for a post with threading and sorting support. Supports hot/top/new sorting, configurable nesting depth, and pagination.

post.description: AT-URI of the post to get comments for

sort.description: Sort order: hot (trending), top (highest score), new (most recent)

timeframe.description: Timeframe for 'top' sort. Ignored for other sort types.

depth.description: Maximum reply nesting depth to return. 0 returns only top-level comments.

limit.description: Maximum number of top-level comments to return per page

comments.description: Top-level comments with nested replies up to requested depth

post.description: The post these comments belong to

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching next page of top-level comments

errors.name: InvalidRequest
errors.description: Invalid parameters (malformed URI, invalid sort/timeframe combination, etc.)
